landing.heroDesc: Streamline workforce scheduling, location audits, equipment maintenance, and compliance management — all in one powerful platform.

features.title: Powerful Features Built for Scale
features.subtitle: Enterprise-grade tools designed to help teams maintain standards across multiple locations. From single sites to hundreds of locations.

customTemplates.title: Custom Audit Templates
customTemplates.desc: Design unlimited templates with custom sections, scoring rules, and field types. Clone and modify templates for different locations or inspection types.

realTimeAnalytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
realTimeAnalytics.desc: Live dashboards with performance trends, location comparisons, and section-level breakdowns. Identify issues before they become problems.

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-Based Access Control
roleBasedAccess.desc: Granular permissions for admins, managers, checkers, and HR. Control who sees what data and who can perform which actions.

automatedScheduling.title: Automated Scheduling
automatedScheduling.desc: Set up recurring audits that run automatically. Never miss a compliance deadline with smart reminders and calendar integration.

photoDocumentation.title: Photo Documentation
photoDocumentation.desc: Capture and attach photos directly to audit responses. Build a visual history of compliance and issues across all locations.

professionalReports.title: Professional Reports
professionalReports.desc: Generate branded PDF reports with scores, photos, and detailed findings. Share with stakeholders or archive for compliance records.

smartNotifications.title: Smart Notifications
smartNotifications.desc: Role-based alerts keep the right people informed. Recurring reminders, audit completion notices, and escalation workflows.

equipmentManagement.title: Equipment Management
equipmentManagement.desc: Track equipment across locations, schedule maintenance, and log interventions. Keep your assets running smoothly.

auditTrail.title: Complete Audit Trail
auditTrail.desc: Every change is logged with full revision history. Demonstrate compliance with complete transparency and accountability.

teamMembers.title: Designed for Every Team Member
teamMembers.subtitle: From executives needing oversight to field workers conducting inspections — everyone has the tools they need

administrators.title: Administrators
administrators.desc: Complete control over templates, users, locations, and company-wide settings. Access comprehensive analytics, configure billing, manage modules, and set up integrations. The command center for your entire operation.

managers.title: Managers
managers.desc: Manage staff schedules, approve time-off requests, and monitor team performance. Conduct audits, assign tasks, and receive real-time notifications about their locations. The bridge between strategy and execution.

checkers.title: Checkers & Inspectors
checkers.desc: Mobile-first experience for on-the-ground inspections. Complete checklists, capture photos, add observations, and submit findings in real-time. Works offline and syncs when connected.

hrTeams.title: HR Teams
hrTeams.desc: Handle employee onboarding, track training completion, manage documents, and ensure workforce compliance. Access payroll data and performance reviews.

staffMembers.title: Staff Members
staffMembers.desc: View schedules, clock in/out, request time off, and swap shifts. Access training materials, complete assigned tests, and track their own performance.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: From signup to your first audit in under an hour. Our guided setup walks you through every step.

step1.title: Set Up Your Company
step1.desc: Create your account, add your company details, and invite your team. Choose your industry to get pre-configured templates and settings tailored to your needs.

step2.title: Add Locations & Staff
step2.desc: Register your sites with addresses, managers, and operating hours. Import your employee list or add staff manually with their roles and assignments.

step3.title: Create Your Templates
step3.desc: Build custom audit checklists with sections, fields, and scoring. Use the template marketplace to find industry-specific templates or start from scratch.

step4.title: Schedule Audits
step4.desc: Set up recurring audit schedules or create one-time inspections. Assign checkers, set due dates, and configure automatic reminders.

step5.title: Conduct Inspections
step5.desc: Your team completes audits on mobile or desktop. Capture photos, add notes, and score each item. Results sync instantly to your dashboard.

step6.title: Analyze & Improve
step6.desc: Review performance trends, identify problem areas, and track improvements over time. Generate reports for stakeholders and regulatory compliance.

contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your operations and compliance process?
